sentences.sContent: Topaz occurs in the igneous rock rhyolite.
sentences.sContent_eng: Topaz occurs in the igneous rock rhyolite.
sentences.sCn: 黄晶通常产于火成岩岩石纹。

sentences.sContent: People come to this area in order to see the colorful rhyolite mountains.
sentences.sContent_eng: People come to this area in order to see the colorful rhyolite mountains.
sentences.sCn: 人们来到这个地区是为了观看那里五彩缤纷的流纹岩山脉。

sentences.sContent: The violent and unexpected nature of the blasts, together with their rarity, means the Chaiténeruption is the first rhyolite event to have been scientifically assessed in this way [ABC News].
sentences.sContent_eng: The violent and unexpected nature of the blasts, together with their rarity, means the Chaiténeruption is the first rhyolite event to have been scientifically assessed in this way [ABC News].
sentences.sCn: 其猛烈及难以预料的自然爆发，及它们的罕见程度,  意味着Chaitén火山爆发已经被这样合乎逻辑地评估为第一个流纹岩活动 [美国广播公司消息]。

synos.tran: [岩]流纹岩；表面光滑的火山岩

trans.tranOther: a fine-grained igneous rock consisting of quartz, feldspars, and mica or amphibole
